participant_1.background:
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
I learned that my best friend was lying to me about everything.
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
I like to read books and watch documentaries to expand my knowledge.
My most valued possession is my dog, who has never failed to make me smile.

participant_2.background:
I've always been close with my family, even though my brother has gotten into trouble.
every day i drive an hour to work in this horrible traffic.
I've been crocheting a lot in my free time.
i love to climb.
I am a reliable and hardworking individual who enjoys spending time with my family and friends, but also values alone time to relax.

content.text: Hey! I'm currently watching a documentary about the history of the world. It's really interesting! What are you up to today?
Hi! I'm currently crocheting a scarf. I'm trying to get better at it, but it's hard! What are you watching?
It's about all the major events that have happened over the years, and how they've shaped the world today. It's really interesting!
That sounds really interesting! I love history, but I don't know a lot about it.
You should watch it! It's on Netflix.
I'll check it out! What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to read, watch documentaries, and spend time with my dog.
Those all sound really fun! I like to crochet, climb, and spend time with my family.
I've always wanted to learn how to climb!
It's really fun! You should try it sometime.
Great! I'm sure you'd love it.
